target.name: standalone-demo
target.description: build webapp and copy files for standalone demo
target.echo:
Cocoon standalone-demo ---------------------- After building this version with "build standalone-demo" from the main Cocoon distribution directory, copying the ${build.standalone.demo} and ${build.webapp} directories somewhere else provides you with a simple standalone Cocoon installation, meant for test and demo purposes.
To start this standalone demo use either "./cocoon.sh servlet" or "cocoon.bat servlet" in the standalone-demo directory.
The webapp directory must be found as "../webapp" for this to work:
common-parent-directory | +----------- standalone-demo +----------- webapp
Note that the version of the jetty servlet engine that is included with this demo is not the full version. For production uses, we recommend that you get a complete servlet engine and install it according to your needs.
Have fun! Your friendly neighbourhood Cocoon team.
